Package com.hexaforce.warzone.services

Class MapService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.services.MapService
public class MapService extends Object
The MapService class load, read, parse, edit, and save map file.

      public MapService()

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      public Map loadMap(GameContext p_gameState, String p_loadFileName) throws InvalidMap
      The loadmap method will process the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - current state of game.
      p_loadFileName - map file name.
      Returns:
      Map object after processing map file.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicates Map Object Validation failure

    • loadFile

      public List<String> loadFile(String p_loadFileName) throws InvalidMap
      The loadFile method load and read map file.
      Parameters:
      p_loadFileName - map file name to load.
      Returns:
      List of lines from map file.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicates Map Object Validation failure

    • getMetaData

      public List<String> getMetaData(List<String> p_fileLines, String p_switchParameter)
      Returns the corresponding map file lines.
      Parameters:
      p_fileLines - All Lines in the map document
      p_switchParameter - Type of lines needed : country, continent, borders
      Returns:
      List required set of lines

    • parseContinentData

      public List<Continent> parseContinentData(List<String> p_continentList)
      The parseContinentData method parse extracted continent data of map file.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - includes continent data in list from map file
      Returns:
      List of processed continent meta data

    • parseCountryData

      public List<Country> parseCountryData(List<String> p_countriesList)
      The parseCountryData method parse extracted country and border data of map file.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - includes country data in list from map file.
      Returns:
      List of processed country meta data.

    • updateCountryNeighbors

      public List<Country> updateCountryNeighbors(List<Country> p_countriesList, List<String> p_bordersList)
      Links the Country Objects to their respective neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - Total Country Objects Initialized
      p_bordersList - Border Data Lines
      Returns:
      List Updated Country Objects

    • linkCountryToContinents

      public List<Continent> linkCountryToContinents(List<Country> p_countries, List<Continent> p_continents)
      Links countries to corresponding continents and sets them in object of continent.
      Parameters:
      p_countries - Total Country Objects
      p_continents - Total Continent Objects
      Returns:
      List of updated continents

    • editMap

      public void editMap(GameContext p_gameState, String p_editFilePath) throws IOException, InvalidMap
      Method is responsible for creating a new map if a map to be edited does not exists, and if it exists it parses the map file to game state object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - GameContext model class object
      p_editFilePath - consists of base filepath
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicates Map Object Validation failure
      IOException - triggered in case the file does not exist or the file name is invalid

    • editFunctions

      public void editFunctions(GameContext p_gameState, String p_argument, String p_operation, Integer p_switchParameter) throws IOException, InvalidMap, InvalidCommand
      Controls the Flow of Edit Operations: editcontinent, editcountry, editneighbor.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameContext Object.
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation.
      p_operation - Add/Remove operation to be performed.
      p_switchParameter - Type of Edit Operation to be performed.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception.
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception.
      InvalidCommand - invalid command exception

    • addRemoveContinents

      public Map addRemoveContinents(GameContext p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_operation, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Constructs updated Continents list based on passed operations - Add/Remove and Arguments.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameContext Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - Map Object to be Updated
      p_operation - Operation to perform on Continents
      p_argument - Arguments pertaining to the operations
      Returns:
      List of updated continents
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • addRemoveCountry

      public Map addRemoveCountry(GameContext p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_argument, String p_operation) throws InvalidMap
      Performs the add/remove operation on the countries in map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameContext Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - The Map to be updated
      p_operation - Operation to be performed
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation
      Returns:
      Updated Map Object
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • addRemoveNeighbor

      public Map addRemoveNeighbor(GameContext p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_argument, String p_operation) throws InvalidMap
      Performs the add/remove operation on Map Object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameContext Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - The Map to be updated
      p_operation - Add/Remove operation to be performed
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation
      Returns:
      map to be updated
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • saveMap

      public boolean saveMap(GameContext p_gameState, String p_fileName) throws InvalidMap
      Parses the updated map to .map file and stores it at required location.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameContext
      p_fileName - filename to save things in
      Returns:
      true/false based on successful save operation of map to file
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - InvalidMap exception

    • resetMap

      public void resetMap(GameContext p_gameState, String p_fileToLoad)
      Resets Game State's Map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - object of GameContext class
      p_fileToLoad - File which couldn't be loaded
